text.snippet: Learn the pros and cons of taking on short-term opportunities
text.paragraph1: It's natural to be attracted to new business opportunities, and the promise of quick cash flow they can bring.
text.paragraph2: While profitable projects are hard to turn down, putting more on your plate can lead to a lack of time, focus, and direction. Learn how to navigate the challenges of 'priority ping-pong' in "The Dangers of Short-Term Opportunities."
